definitions.definition: Any dress (feminine-style garment) worn under another, especially under an overdress .
Any garment (any clothing ) that is worn under another but is not underwear .

main_definition: ( countable ) Any dress (feminine-style garment) worn under another, especially under an overdress .
secondary_definitions: ( countable , uncountable ) Any garment (any clothing ) that is worn under another but is not underwear .
